column6: The Wizard has come all the way to Saturn's moon, Titan, to get revenge on his greatest enemy, but Reed Richards is more concerned with the message encoded in a strange artifact from 700 light years away.  Meanwhile, the current FF deal with the aftermath of their battle with the Marvel Zombies.
column8: | inker:Rick Magyar | writer:Dwayne McDuffie | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller:Paul Pelletier | penciller (cover):Michael Turner | letterer:Rus Wooton
